snippet.title: Shift'n Slay - Early Gameplay Trailer | PC Games
snippet.description:
A brutal blend of turn-based tactics and roguelike. Take on the role of an executioner, grab crime by the throat with the hand of the law... and smash it! Because you are the law!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2698460?utm_source=youtube&utm_content=reveal

#ShiftNSlay #IndieGame #TurnBased #PCgames
